EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Tammy Dugan
diff.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dss_rule ( rule_id int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, class_filename varchar(500) NOT NULL, creation_time datetime NOT NULL, priority int(11) default NULL, title varchar(500) default NULL, version double default NULL, institution varchar(500) default NULL, author varchar(500) default NULL, specialist varchar(500) default NULL, ruleCreationDate varchar(500) default NULL, purpose varchar(500) default NULL, explanation varchar(500) default NULL, keywords varchar(500) default NULL, citations varchar(500) default NULL, links varchar(500) default NULL, data varchar(500) default NULL, logic varchar(500) default NULL, action varchar(500) default NULL, last_modified datetime default NULL, rule_type varchar(500) default NULL, token_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, age_min_units varchar(20) default NULL, age_max_units varchar(20) default NULL, age_min int(11) default NULL, age_max int(11) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (rule_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config (`name`, `schedulable_class`, `start_time`, `start_time_pattern`, `repeat_interval`, `start_on_startup`, `started`, `created_by`, `date_created`, `uuid`) SELECT 'ClassLoaderTask','org.openmrs.module.dss.ClassLoaderTask', NOW(), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss', 300, 1, 0, 1, NOW(), UUID() FROM (select count(*) as cnt from scheduler_task_config where name='ClassLoaderTask') a WHERE a.cnt=0;

diff.author: Steve McKee
diff.description: Convert the logic column of the dss_rule table to medium text.
diff.sql: alter table dss_rule change logic logic mediumtext

diff.author: Diego Dayan
diff.description: Add helper table to enable a many-to-many relationship between concepts and rules
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE `dss_rule_by_concept` ( `rule_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `concept_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rule_id`,`concept_id`), KEY `fk_concept_id` (`concept_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_rule_id` FOREIGN KEY (`rule_id`) REFERENCES `dss_rule` (`rule_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_concept_id` FOREIGN KEY (`concept_id`) REFERENCES `concept` (`concept_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
